releaseNotes:
Thanks for all of your feedbacks. 
* Redisgin app icon.
* Fix "Ratio" button missing bug for Poster Template.
* Fix other minor bugs. 

RECENT UPDATES V7.2.1

- New features: 

For Collage & Photo Edit: 
We have added precise adjust with "-/+" button for photo size,rotation. And enable swap photos between grids just with one finger move photo 
to other grid. Also we have optimize photo pinch gesture which enable photo zoom in/out and rotate at the same time.  

For FreeStyle: 
We have added a "Reset" function to rearrange your photos to default layout. And a Preview fucntion when canvas in 
Device size. Just tap the empty area of canvas to preview and tap again to exit preview. 

- Optimization: 

* Optimize some user interface. And improve imported and exported photo quality.
* Optimize customize bg.
* Optimize default position for added stickers.
* Optimize Customize background UI
* Move popular tools to the head of toolbar 

- Bug fixes: 

* Fixed sticker menu's toolbar out of screen issue which caused by bottom ad banner's appear. 
* Fixed can't save collage to Camera Roll bug issue at some time. * Fixed can't import too small photos, and some critical crash bug fixes.  
* Fixed can't tap "recent/featured/system" buttion in text menu after keyboard closed.
* Fixed can't apply effect in Stitch mode. 
* Fixed some crash bugs.

If you any questions, suggestions, and feedbacks, please contact us at livecollage.us@gmail.com
description:
LiveCollage - #1  All-in-1 Photo Collage Maker & Photo Editor  & Video Editor for your best moments!  Make perfect pic collages of all your wonderful  moments and memories.

Create fun, amazing layout & collage by remixing your own photos with text,sticker,motion sticker,filter,frame,background in seconds and sharing them with your friends.

LiveCollage's smooth, intuitive process make it very easy to control your editing & making. LiveCollage has everything you need to create fantastic collages with your photos.  It never be so easy to unleash your creativity.

Features:

- 5000+ easy-to-use layouts and clean design
- Theme templates:  well-designed templates for Holiday,Xmas,Party,Birthday,Family,Love,Baby,etc
- Classic: fully adjustable basic layout, remix up to 16 photos.
- Poster: tons of stylish and unique POSTER layouts
- FreeStyle: pin moments to a well customized board
- Stitch: combine more than 16 photos into a long picture
- Combine 1 ~ 16 pictures into a amazing photo
- Extremely easy & flexible to create a collage story with photos
- Tons of stickers,motion stickers,frames,backgrounds,fitlers
- Font: add clever captions & next trending meme with our amazing hand-picked fonts.
- Frame: beautify your photos into framed artwork with 500+ creative photo borders.
- Filters: trendy Retouch filters - Portrait and Vintage, Classic, Double-exposure, Texture, Light etc.
- Background: brush your photo background with a bit colors.
- Blur: create blurred background for photo.
- Ratio for fb cover, fb post, twitter post, iPhone4/5/6 wallpaper.
- Photo Editor: professional designed filters, touch-up tools(draw, redeye, blemish, etc) and more!
- Retouch: Tune your face with Acne, Tooth, Smooth, Face, Tone facetune toolbox etc.

-Video Editor: Create amazing music video with magic video filters, free popular musics.
- Slideshow: Transform photos into stunning video.
- Magic Video Filter: Add amazing animated and very cool video filters to make fun & incredible videos.
- Music: Pick the perfect song for your photos and videos to create a celebrity-quality music video
- MotionSticker camera: Make and send fun video message with amazing & funny live stickers to your friends.

- Explore your saved collages via built-in gallery.
- Ability to re-edit saved collages
- High resolution output
- Share your creations to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, SMS, email, and more.


Questions? Feedback? We love it. Please write us at :
livecollage.us@gmail.com

**DISCLAIMER**
We are not affiliated with Instagram, Evernote, Twitter, Facebook,Whatsapp, Kik, Line, Thumblr,Tanggo,Pinterest or any other social media.
